author: Annie Palmer
title: Tesla reportedly bought a company that specializes in high-speed battery manufacturing
description: Tesla reportedly acquired Hibar Systems, which specializes in high-speed battery manufacturing for electric vehicles.
content:
Tesla has quietly acquired Hibar Systems, a company that specializes in high-speed battery manufacturing systems for electric vehicles, according to Canadian news site Electric Autonomy. 
It's unclear when the deal took place, but Tesla lists Hibar as a subs… [+922 chars]
